snippet: The envoy, Lakhdar Brahimi, has enlisted Iran’s help in trying to persuade President Bashar al-Assad to support a temporary cease-fire.
abstract: Lakhdar Brahimi, new Syria peace envoy from United Nations and Arab League, elists Iran's help in effort to negotiate cease-fire in observance of three-day holiday Id al-Adha, in hopes that religious reprieve could become basis for dialogue.
lead_paragraph: The envoy, Lakhdar Brahimi, has enlisted Iran’s help in trying to persuade President Bashar al-Assad to support a temporary cease-fire.

headline.seo: Brahimi Seeks Syria Cease-Fire for Id
headline.main: U.N. Envoy Seeks Pause in Syria for Holiday
headline.print_headline: U.N. Envoy Seeks Pause In Syria For Holiday
